title: Upending an Industry: How Digital Banking Will Simplify Corporates’ Financial Needs
description: In this episode, Hari Moorthy, head of Transaction Banking for Goldman Sachs, talks about innovations in banking technology for corporations and what it’s been like to build the first-ever digital-only transaction bank over the past two years.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
